items.name: Poke Ball
items.text: Attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Gold Nugget
items.text: Sell for $300.

items.name: Potion
items.text: Heal +5 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Star Piece
items.text: Sell for $350

items.name: Trick Room
items.text: Held Item: The slower initiative value goes first.

items.name: Soda Water
items.text: Heal +8 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to half HP (Rounded Up).

items.name: Speed Scarf
items.text: Held Item: Add +2 to your Active Pokemon's speed stat.

items.name: Pokemon Doll
items.text: If you would be chosen for another trainers Battle partner, instead reroll the die one time.

items.name: Choice Berry
items.text: Heal your active pokemon for 1d4-1 HP.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.text: Held Item: Your active pokemon has no weakness.

items.name: Pokemon Fan Club
items.text: Encounter a Wild Pokemon instead of having your turn.

items.name: Acro Bike
items.text: Your next movement die is now a d8.

items.name: Great Ball
items.text: Add +1 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Heavy Ball
items.text: Add +3 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon with a speed value in the negatives.

items.name: Quick Ball
items.text: Add +3 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon with a speed value greater than 3.

items.name: Heal Ball
items.text: Add +3 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon with an HP stat of 15 or higher.

items.name: Joker's Ball
items.text: Possibly add +5 to your next attempt at catching a Pokemon. Possibly subtract -5 from your attempt at catching a Pokemon.

items.name: Max Potion
items.text: Heal +10 HP from your active Pokemon.

items.name: Flat Tire
items.text: Choose an opponent. Their next movement die is a d4.

items.name: Team Rocket's Plan
items.text: If your opponent would land on a WildPokemon spot, instead treat it as a Battle spot.

items.name: Lost Vacuum
items.text: If your opponent would land on an Item spot, instead give that item to yourself.

items.name: Max Revive
items.text: Revive one KO'ed Pokemon to full HP.

items.name: Quick Claw
items.text: Held Item: Add +3 to your Active Pokemon's speed stat.

items.name: Focus Sash
items.text: Held Item: If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

items.name: X Speed
items.text: Permanently increase the speed of your Active Pokemon by 1.

items.name: Trecking Shoes
items.text: You have advantage on your next movement roll.

items.name: Master Ball
items.text: Automatically catch the next Pokemon encountered.

items.name: Trainer Repel
items.text: Ignore the next Battle spot you land on.

items.name: Ultra Ball
items.text: Add +2 to your next attempt at catching a wild Pokemon.

items.name: Citrus Berry
items.text: Held Item: If this Pokemon's HP drops below Half HP heal 1d8. Once per battle.

items.name: Red's Parting Gift
items.text: During your next Gym Battle only, subtract -5 DMG from a Gym leaders active Pokemon's attacks.

items.name: Pokemon Incense
items.text: Choose a Pokemon Type. Your next WildPokemon roll will be of that type.

items.name: Black Sludge
items.text: During your next GYM battle only, you go first instead of the GYM Leader.

items.name: Odd Pear
items.text: Held Item: Your Top Atk does +2 DMG while your Bottom Atk does -5 DMG.

items.name: Odd Banana
items.text: Held Item: Your Bottom Atk does +2 DMG while your Top Atk does -5 DMG

items.name: Bronze Cup
items.text: Held Item: Your Active Pokemon's HP stat is -5, all your Atk's do +2 DMG.

items.name: Heartgold Crystal
items.text: Held Item: If your Active Pokemon goes first, your first attack does double DMG.

items.name: Shiny Charm
items.text: Quadruple your shiny encounter rate.

items.name: TM Machine
items.text: Randomly change 1 of your Active Pokemon's attacks.

items.name: Mystic Crystal
items.text: Held Item: Increases the damage of your attacks by +3 when your Active Pokemon is at full HP.
